age_range.evidence: Participant is a master's student, typical age range for this level of study.

gender.evidence: Participant's language and interests align with typical male preferences.

location.evidence: Participant states 'I live in California right now. San Diego specifically.'

living_situation.evidence: Participant states 'I rent a room in single family house. I have to 3 roommates.'

occupation.evidence: Participant explicitly states 'research assistant' and 'master's student.'

education.evidence: Participant states 'I'm taking actually our research projects. So I'm probably basically doing research on full time.'

goals_and_motivations.value: Reduce eye strain, improve productivity, explore new technologies.
goals_and_motivations.evidence: Participant purchases a blue light blocking glasses to address eye strain, mentions work on AI research projects.

interests.evidence: Participant's research assistant role, interest in AI, gaming habits, hiking, and climbing.

values.evidence: Participant's focus on quality ratings and price when purchasing, preference for efficient shopping experiences.

frequency_of_use.evidence: Participant shops for groceries with roommates and buys items online regularly.

where_used_devices.evidence: Participant uses a computer for research, browsing on a smartphone, and shopping online.

search_style_best_vs_first.evidence: Participant primarily looks at the first page of search results.

price_preference_cheapest_vs_expensive.evidence: Participant chooses the most affordable option for the blue light glasses.

decision_factors.evidence: Participant prioritizes high ratings, reasonable prices, and high purchase volume when evaluating products.

preferred_categories.evidence: Participant purchases research equipment, books, and supplements.

pain_points_and_or_challenges.value: Information overload on Amazon, difficulty finding relevant recommendations.
pain_points_and_or_challenges.evidence: Participant expresses frustration with the overwhelming number of products on Amazon and dissatisfaction with the recommendations provided.
